languages.text: "О, мои любимые партнеры-ксеноупырьки. Им была поручена важная часть операции, о которой тебе ничего нельзя знать. Сколько незабываемых моментов подарили мне их визиты к Эпитафии. Нам было строго велено не стрелять в них первыми, но разнести на атомы, если их тощие задницы хоть на градус отклонятся от одобренных траекторий полета. Такие они затейники, раз сто пытались нарваться на залп со своими глупыми провокациями. Звали меня Почти-Ведьмой. Это комплимент... наверное".

"Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."
languages.original_text: "О, мои любимые партнеры-ксеноупырьки. Им была поручена важная часть операции, о которой тебе ничего нельзя знать. Сколько незабываемых моментов подарили мне их визиты к Эпитафии. Нам было строго велено не стрелять в них первыми, но разнести на атомы, если их тощие задницы хоть на градус отклонятся от одобренных траекторий полета. Такие они затейники, раз сто пытались нарваться на залп со своими глупыми провокациями. Звали меня Почти-Ведьмой. Это комплимент... наверное".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, xeno-vampires, my favourite kind of partners. They had a very important role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph had gifted me with so many unforgettable moments. We were strictly ordered not to open fire first, but split them into atoms lest their skinny asses deviate so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. They were rather inventive, too, seeing as they tried to get fired at a bunch of times with their silly provocations. They called me Almost-Wych. That's a compliment... I guess."

"Oh, xeno-vampires, my favourite kind of partners. They had a very important role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

languages.text: « Ah, les xénos, mes partenaires préférés. Ils avaient un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'opération dont vous ne devez rien savoir. Leurs visites sur Épitaphe ont été autant de moments inoubliables. Nous avions l'ordre de ne pas tirer en premier, mais d'atomiser ces salopards dégingandés s'ils déviaient d'un seul degré de leurs trajectoires de vol autorisées. Leurs provocations stupides donnaient l'impression que ces demeurés essayaient sciemment de se faire. Ils m'avaient même donné un surnom : la Presque-Céraste. C'était un compliment... Enfin, je crois. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, les xénos, mes partenaires préférés. Ils avaient un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'opération dont vous ne devez rien savoir. Leurs visites sur Épitaphe ont été autant de moments inoubliables. Nous avions l'ordre de ne pas tirer en premier, mais d'atomiser ces salopards dégingandés s'ils déviaient d'un seul degré de leurs trajectoires de vol autorisées. Leurs provocations stupides donnaient l'impression que ces demeurés essayaient sciemment de se faire. Ils m'avaient même donné un surnom : la Presque-Céraste. C'était un compliment... Enfin, je crois. »

languages.text: «Ah, las alimañas xenos... mis aliados preferidos. Desempeñaban un papel crucial en aquella operación tan secreta. Sus visitas a Epitafio me dieron tantos buenos momentos. Al principio nos dijeron que no abriéramos fuego, sino que los redujéramos a átomos si los muy enclenques se desviaban aunque fuera un solo grado de las trayectorias de vuelo que tenían aprobadas. A veces parecía que sus gracias y provocaciones tuvieran por objetivo conseguir que los dispararan. Incluso me pusieron un apodo: la casi-Bruja. Que sería un cumplido... supongo».
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, los xenovampiros... mis aliados preferidos. Desempeñaban un papel importantísimo en aquella operación tan secreta. Sus visitas a Epitafio me dieron tantos buenos momentos. Al principio nos dijeron que no abriéramos fuego, sino que los redujéramos a átomos para que los muy enclenques no se desviaran ni un solo grado de las trayectorias de vuelo que tenían aprobadas. También eran bastante ingeniosos; no paraban de provocarnos para que les voláramos los sesos. Me llamaban casi-Bruja; sería un cumplido... supongo».

languages.text: “噢，那些异形怪物啊，他们是我最喜欢的搭档。你肯定不知道，他们在那场行动中扮演了多么重要的角色。参观荒垄碑碣那场旅程，他们给我带来了很多难忘的时刻。我们当时得到了命令，说见到他们不要开火，要把他们直接分解成原子，以免他们瘦削的屁股跑偏了路线。说真的，他们当时有好几次用蠢到家的行为挑衅我，我差点就朝他们开火了。他们还说我‘和巫灵差不多’，我猜……这应该是某种赞美吧。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

traits.locale_text: “噢，那些异形吸血鬼，他们是我最喜欢的搭档。你肯定不知道，他们在那场行动中扮演了多么重要的角色。参观荒垄碑碣那场旅程，他们给我带来了很多难忘的时刻。我们当时得到了命令，说见到他们不要开火，要把他们直接分解成原子，以免他们瘦削的屁股跑偏了路线。他们当时也相当有创意，好几次用蠢到家的行为挑衅我，我差点就朝他们开火了。他们说我‘和巫灵差不多’，我猜……这应该是某种赞美吧。”

languages.text: 「ああ、私のお気に入りのパートナーの異種族フリークスか。彼らは、あんたが何も知らないだろう作戦で、とても重要な役割を担っていた。彼らの墓碑への訪問は、私に忘れられない瞬間をたくさん与えてくれた。私たちは、まず発砲しないように命じられたが、あいつらのやせ細ったケツが承認された飛行経路から一度でも外れたら、彼らを原子に分解しろって言われたのさ。あのバカどもは、愚かな挑発行為でまるで撃たれようとしているかのようだったよ。彼らは私を半魔女だというあだ名までつけて呼んでいた。まあ、褒め言葉なんじゃないかな」
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、異種族の吸血鬼、私のお気に入りのパートナーだ。彼らは、あんたが何も知らないだろう作戦で、とても重要な役割を担っていた。彼らのエピタフへの訪問は、私に忘れられない瞬間をたくさん与えてくれた。私たちは、まず発砲しないように命じられたが、あいつらのやせ細ったケツが承認された飛行経路から外れないように、彼らを原子に分割した。愚かな挑発行為で何度も開戦させようとしたのを見ると、連中もなかなかやるもんだと思ったよ。彼らは私を半魔女だと呼んだ。まあ、褒め言葉なんじゃないかな」

languages.text: "Ah, die Xenosfanatiker, meine Lieblingspartner. Ihnen kam bei der Operation, von der Ihr nichts wissen dürft, eine entscheidende Rolle zu. Ihre Besuche auf Epitaph haben mir so viele unvergessliche Momente beschert. Wir hatten Befehl, nicht zuerst auf sie zu feuern, sollten sie ihre dürren Ärsche aber pulverisieren, falls sie auch nur ein Grad von ihren bestätigten Flugrouten abweichen würden. Ich schwöre, es war, als wollten diese Idioten mit ihren unüberlegten Provokationen erreichen, dass wir auf sie schießen. Sie hatten sogar einen Spitznamen für mich ... die Beinahe-Hektari. Ein Kompliment ... Glaube ich."
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Xeno-Vampire, meine Lieblingspartner. Sie hatten bei der Operation, von der Ihr nichts wissen dürft, eine sehr wichtige Rolle zu spielen. Ihre Besuche auf Epitaph haben mir so viele unvergessliche Augenblicke beschert. Wir hatten Befehl, nicht zuerst das Feuer zu eröffnen, haben sie aber in ihre Atome zerlegt, damit diese dürren Arschlöcher kein einziges Grad von ihren genehmigten Flugpfaden abweichen. Sie waren auch recht einfallsreich und haben regelmäßig versucht, durch alberne Provokationen dafür zu sorgen, dass wir auf sie schießen. Sie haben mich Fast-Hekatari genannt. Das ist ein Kompliment ... Glaube ich."

languages.text: "Zeno ucubeler, en sevdiğim eşlikçilerim... Hakkında bilgi sahibi olmaman gereken operasyonda hayati bir rol oynadılar. Sinyazıt'ı ziyaretleri hep unutulmaz anılar yaşattı bana. İlk talimatlara göre onları vurmayacaktık ama onaylı uçuş güzergâhlarından bir derece bile sapmaları hâlinde atomlarına ayırma iznimiz vardı. Bu yarım akıllılar bizi kışkırtarak resmen onlara ateş etmemizi istiyorlardı. Bana bir lakap bile takmışlardı: Neredeyse Viç. Bunu iltifat olarak alıyorum tabii."
languages.original_text: "Ah, the xenofreaks, my favourite partners. They had a crucial role to play in the operation that you mustn't know anything about. Their visits to Epitaph have left me with so many unforgettable moments. We were ordered not to fire on them first, but to split them into atoms if their skinny arses deviated so much as a single degree from their approved flight paths. I swear, it was as if those fools were trying to get shot at with their half-witted provocations. They even had a nickname for me — the Almost Wych. A compliment... I guess."
